itunes:summary:
'Mayans M.C.' star Vincent "Rocco" Vargas joins the show to talk about the new season of 'Mayans M.C.' on FX, how good at FX is at finding and making great shows -- both dramas like 'Mayans' and comedies like 'Atlanta' -- plus the subway shooter has been captured in New York City.
